tool.name: WA2: Update Organism
tool.description: updates an existing genome with WebApollo
tool.command:
python $__tool_directory__/add_organism.py
@AUTH@
$organismId
#if str($jbrowse) !="None": --jbrowse $jbrowse.files_path/JBrowse-1.11.6/data/ #end if
#if str($commonName) != "None": --commonName "$commonName" #end if
#if str($blatdb) != "None": --blatdb "$blatdb" #end if
#if str($genus) != "None": --genus "$genus" #end if
#if str($species) != "None": --species "$species" #end if
$public
> $output
tool.help:
**What it does**
Adds an organism to the Apollo database. The tool takes the output of a JBrowse run as that contains all of the necessary information for which tracks are appropriate for a given analysis.
